amendatorysection.catchline: Joint debtors not originally summoned made judgment debtors.
amendatorysection.para: When a judgment is recovered against one or more persons jointly indebted upon contract, those who were not originally summoned may be made parties to the judgment by action.

annotation.para: Where revivor of dormant judgment was had, want of jurisdiction in obtaining original judgment on joint promissory note could not be raised by injunction. Haynes v. Aultman, Miller & Co., 36 Neb. 257, 54 N.W. 511 (1893).
